headline: House Republicans send letter to Hunter Biden law firm seeking preservation of records
author: Andrew Mark Miller
sentences: Chuck Grassley and Ron Johnson took to the Senate floor to sound the alarm about what they say are troubling financial entanglements between President Biden’s son Hunter and the Chinese government in the form a receipt provided by the senators showing a state-controlled Chinese energy company paying Wells Fargo Clearing Services $100,000 with "further credit" going to Owasco, Hunter Biden’s firm.
